description: This file defines a custom React hook called useUndoRedo that manages undo and redo functionality for an application's state. It maintains internal history stacks and provides methods to manipulate the state with undo/redo capabilities.

methods.name: useUndoRedo(initial)
methods.description: Initializes and returns an undo/redo enabled state object with methods to update state, undo, redo, and reset.
